content:
This system of two linear equations is graphed below.

$\qquad\green{x=\dfrac{y}{3}+ \dfrac{5}{3}}$

$\qquad\pink{4x - 5= - 2y}$

**Create a new equation by setting the left-hand side of the upper equation equal to the right-hand side of the lower equation and solving for $y$.**  
[[☃ expression 1]]

The solution to the original system of equations [[☃ dropdown 1]] a solution to the new equation.

**Graph the new equation below using the third line.**  

[[☃ interactive-graph 1]]
